item.description: For when you just need a sword.

item.description: The true breakfast of champions.\n\n<color=green>Consume to forget your worries.</color>

item.description: A primitive device capable of tricking fish out of the water.

item.description: It's empty.

item.description: <color=green> Restores a bit of energy, which allows performing special actions on select weapons. </color>\n\n<color=yellow>Contains 2 charges.</color>

item.name: Mild Energy Potion (1/2)
item.description: It's half full, or half empty, depending on how you look at it.\n\n<color=green> Restores a bit of energy, which allows performing special actions on select weapons. </color>

item.name: Rothar's Wedding Ring
item.description: You gained this ring when you married your wife, Fayle.

item.name: Crab Shell
item.description: It's hardy.

item.description: Very tough to chew unless you cook it.

item.name: Cooked Crab
item.description: Tastes like chicken.

item.description: A simple fish for simple people.

item.description: It has a pretty tail.

item.description: Tastes a little bit like chicken.

item.description: Tastes somewhat like chicken.

item.name: Cooked Horsetail Reed Bass
item.description: It has an interesting taste... chicken?

item.name: Cooked Sandstone Grouper
item.description: After a while it begins to taste like chicken.

item.name: Raw Meat
item.description: Only an animal would eat this.

item.name: Steak
item.description: It's beefy.

item.name: Bones
item.description: Unsettling, but they have many uses.

item.name: Bear Pelt
item.description: A material that's tough as bears.

item.name: Bear Paw
item.description: A live bear uses these to whack things.

item.name: Brain
item.description: It's squishy.

item.name: Mushroom
item.description: A common Imberthalesian forest mushroom, it has mind enhancing properties.

item.description: Consume the power of this scroll to weaken your enemy, lowering their resistances to your attacks.

item.name: Spellscroll: Restore Flesh
item.description: Consume the power of this scroll to instantly heal yourself a large amount of health.

item.name: Raw Chicken
item.description: Only an animal would eat this as it is.

item.name: Cooked Chicken
item.description: Definitely tastes like chicken.

item.name: Chicken Bones
item.description: They are like bones, but from a chicken.

item.name: Simple Peasant Outfit
item.description: Helps you blend in with the masses.

item.description: A strong dagger preferred by rogues and shady characters.

item.name: Ring of Wounding
item.description: This ring would see your enemies dead.

item.name: Ring of Accuracy
item.description: With this in hand you strike more true.

item.name: Barley
item.description: It's completely barley.

item.name: Barley Sack
item.description: It's a barley sack, you can put barley in it.

item.name: Mistywood Dew
item.description: Finest whiskey in the land.\n\n<color=green>Consume to forget your worries.</color>

item.name: Mageflower Pedals
item.description: It's as though they seem to be humming.

item.description: Used by magi for all sort of purposes.

item.description: An ingot of iron.

item.description: It has a nice, strong feel to it.

item.description: This armor took its job a little too seriously.

item.description: You're tempted to drink something from it.

item.name: Blueberries
item.description: They're blue and also happen to taste nice.

item.description: <color=green> Restores a bit of mana. </color>\n\n<color=yellow>Contains 2 charges.</color>

item.description: A simple dagger for stabbing simple things.

item.description: Every wizard's best friend.

item.name: Tammi's Spellbound Bark
item.description: It seems to shift colour as you turn it in your hand, this is what Gabrius requested.

item.description: It's half full, or half empty, depending on how you look at it.\n\n<color=green> Temporarily boosts your melee accuracy by 5. </color>

item.name: Spellbound Bark
item.description: It seems to shift colour as you turn it in your hand.

item.name: Copper Helmet
item.description: Protects your head, at least that's the idea.

item.description: Protect's your body, better than peasant's clothing anyway.

item.description: A well crafted helmet, but made from disappointing materials.

item.description: Thoroughly protects your body, but it's still made from disappointing materials.

item.description: A simple helmet made from sturdy iron.

item.description: A decent armor typically worn by a soldier.

item.description: Proper iron battlegear offering decent protection.

item.description: A real Grimoire of the Ancients, it feels disturbingly alive.

item.name: Broom
item.description: Effective against dust, not very useful otherwise.

item.name: Spellbook: Haywind Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of teleporting to Haywind, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Haywind'.</color>

item.name: Cherries
item.description: Their shiny red surface is very satisfying to look at.

item.name: Carrot
item.description: Presumably these are loved by rabbits, but humans can eat them too.

item.name: Corn
item.description: In some places it's even used as currency.

item.name: Eggplant
item.description: It has nothing to do with chickens or their eggs.

item.description: Tasty, but the smell can be off-putting.

item.name: Garlic
item.description: May or may not keep vampires away.

item.description: A lovely drink can be made out of them, or you could just eat them.

item.name: Orange
item.description: Before they were orange, they were actually green.

item.name: Peach
item.description: It's peachy!

item.description: In some parts of the world the question of whether it can be baked on top of a bread-like thing has caused civil wars.

item.description: It's either edible or deadly, depending on what you do with it.

item.description: Some argue it's actually a fruit, but you're remain unconvinced.

item.description: Red and crunchy.

item.description: Like radish, but white.

item.name: Chili
item.description: Capable of disinfecting your food.

item.name: Onion
item.description: Try not to cry when chopping these.

item.name: Beer
item.description: Many prefer their bread in this form.\n\n<color=green>Consume to forget your worries.</color>

item.name: Bread
item.description: Could be turned into everybody's favorite - a cucumber sandwich!

item.name: Hearty Meal
item.description: It's very fulfilling!

item.description: It smells fishy.

item.description: It's beefy!

item.description: It's very fulfilling!

item.name: Fish Meal
item.description: It smells fishy.

item.name: Salad
item.description: As far as foods go, there isn't any meat in it.

item.name: Highwayman Armor
item.description: Lightweight and makeshift, but surprisingly effective.

item.name: Blackpowder Cocktail
item.description:
Drinking this would be a bad idea.

<color=green>Deals damage based on alchemy skill and knocks the target backwards.</color>

<color=green>Use to throw at an enemy.</color>

item.name: Spellscroll: Haywind Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to Haywind.

item.name: Sheepskin Armor
item.description: It's a little itchy and smells of old socks, but it does the job.

item.description: Trolls don't usually wear armor, they usually don't have to.

item.description: An exceptionally tough crafting material, skinned from a nasty troll.

item.description: Provides cover for the head and is also popular amongst the peasantry.

item.description: Provides decent protection without compromising visibility.

item.description: Exactly what it looks like.

item.description: It opens a cell door.

item.description: You wonder what they're made of, but then again it might be better not to know.

item.name: Forest Snake Skin
item.description: It's rather green and scaly.

item.description: I shouldn't read other people's letters.

item.name: Letter from Finnian to Celestina
item.description: I shouldn't read other people's letters.

item.name: Bucket of Water
item.description: It has water in it. You could drink it, if you really want to.

item.name: Apprentice Robes
item.description: An aspiring wizard might use these.

item.description: Suitable for all those people who want to pick up magic but never find the time to practice.

item.description: Actually, this ring never offended anyone.

item.description: It's balanced.

item.description: Strong shield made of iron.

item.description: An interesting read.

item.description: An interesting read.

item.description: It's good at burning.

item.description: A decent hatchet for chopping wood.

item.name: Staff of Furious Winds
item.description: The staff communes with air, summoning stormy gales.\n\n<color=yellow>Eases the casting of Malevolent Gale, removing its mana cost but also lowering its damage.</color>

item.description: The staff comes infused with a spiteful water spirit.\n\n<color=yellow>Eases the casting of Spiteful Seas, removing its mana cost but also lowering its damage.</color>

item.name: Some Test Quest Item From Spider Boss
item.description: Spider maaan, spider maaan...

item.description: Cures the effect of weak poisons.\n\n<color=yellow>Contains 2 charges.</color>

item.description: Cures the effect of weak poisons. It's half full, or half empty, depending on how you look at it.

item.description: It's half full, or half empty, depending on how you look at it.\n\n<color=green> Temporarily boosts your spell accuracy by 5. </color>

item.description: A fine crossbow crafted from the noble oak.\n\n<color=yellow>Slow to reload but deadly at close range.</color>

item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of sneaking around without being detected.

item.name: Hydrobor Robes
item.description: Robes typically worn by the magi of Hydrobor.

item.description: A powerful wand used by the magi of Hydrobor in battle.

item.name: Heirloom Sword
item.description: Supposedly of sentimental value.

item.name: Destiny Charm
item.description: What the hell even is this?!

item.name: An Odd-smelling Box
item.description: An odd-smelling box of ''meat socks'', made of questionable meats.

item.name: Note from Barkeep
item.description: Details the barkeep's order of sausages from Cain.

item.name: Sausage Rolls
item.description: A lunch that won't leave you feeling hungry.

item.name: Spellbook: Dark Consumption
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Dark Consumption - a violent spell that cannibalizes the caster's flesh and turns it into magical energies.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Dark Consumption'.</color>

item.name: Golden Medallion
item.description: You picked it from Arren's body after having murdered him on Gabrius' orders.

item.name: Irethorn Pendant
item.description: You picked it from Arren's body after having murdered him on Gabrius' orders.

item.name: Recall Crystal
item.description: It can be used to return to Gabrius.

item.name: Aesuan Flowers
item.description: A flower with nauseating properties, and a name.

item.name: Map of Silvermirror Fen
item.description: Allows one to find their way to the Witch of the Swamp without getting lost.

item.name: Gambeson
item.description: A padded jacket, providing nominal defense.

item.name: Spellscroll: Manor Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to the Aercrest Manor.

item.name: Spruce Staff
item.description: A simple staff that's helpful with the channeling of magical energies.

item.name: Oak Staff
item.description: A powerful hardwood staff reverberating with magical energies.

item.name: Savage Ring
item.description: This ring improves the ability to land lethal strikes on opponents.

item.name: Hunting Crossbow
item.description: It takes a special kind of crazy to design a crossbow that fires nets, but if it works...

item.name: Small Copper Bag
item.description: Helps a copper miner to carry a little bit more.

item.name: Medium Copper Bag
item.description: Helps a copper miner to carry a fair bit more.

item.name: Large Copper Bag
item.description: Helps a copper miner to carry significantly more.

item.name: Huge Copper Bag
item.description: Helps a miner to carry all the copper they could ever want.

item.name: Small Spruce Bag
item.description: Helps a spruce cutter to carry a little bit more.

item.name: Ampoule of Ranged Resistance
item.description: Even an arrow from a god could not pierce you, but its effects dissipate very quickly!\n\n<color=green> Significantly increases your ranged protection and blocks 90% of incoming ranged damage.</color>

item.name: Ampoule of Spell Resistance
item.description: Even a fireball from a god could not burn you, but its effects dissipate very quickly!\n\n<color=green> Significantly increases your spell resistance and blocks 90% of incoming spell damage.</color>

item.name: Ampoule of Melee Protection
item.description: Even the sword of a god could not rend you, but its effects dissipate very quickly!\n\n<color=green> Significantly increases your melee protection and blocks 90% of incoming physical damage.</color>

item.name: Ancient Ring of the Arcanist
item.description: It acts as an incredible wellspring of mana.

item.name: Ring of the High Mage
item.description: A powerful ring for a versatile spell caster.

item.name: Faehoney
item.description: It's sweet and glittery.

item.name: Bloodhoney
item.description: Obtained through questionable means; it's Faehoney that got fae's blood mixed into it.

item.name: Fairy Stone
item.description: It's cool and glittery.

item.name: Gabrius' Focus
item.description: Though breaking the ancient barrier mostly burned the focus, it still allows magic to easily flow through it.

item.name: Staff of Skeletal Sorcery
item.description: The staff of a long dead mage.\n\n<color=yellow>Allows for a special attack, causing magical damage to all enemies in front of you and cursing them with frailty.</color>

item.name: Dark Wizard's Robes
item.description: Robes of a rogue mage.

item.name: Poisoned Copper Dagger
item.description: A simple dagger for stabbing simple things, coated with poison.

item.name: Mild Weapon Poison
item.description: A dagger's blade could be coated with it.

item.name: Orb of Responsibility
item.description: With great power comes great responsibility.

item.name: Orb of Recklessness
item.description: Go set the world on fire.

item.name: Spellbook: Weakness
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of casting Weakness - a spell that lowers your opponents resistances to your attacks.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Weakness'.</color>

item.name: Potion of Stability
item.description: <color=green> Temporarily increases your... stability? </color>

item.name: Potion of Stability (1/2)
item.description: It's half full, or half empty, depending on how you look at it.\n\n<color=green> Temporarily increases your... stability? </color>

item.name: Book of Forests
item.description: Contains information about tree types, forests and nature in general.

item.name: Book of Fishing
item.description: An interesting read on the variety of fish and how to lure them.

item.name: Book of Weapons
item.description: Contains useful information about sword techniques and weapon types.

item.name: Book of Mining
item.description: Talks about the art of breaking rocks, although it's debatable whether anyone interested in its contents has the intellectual capacity to read.

item.name: Book of Archery
item.description: Read to learn more about hitting a target with a bow.

item.name: Book of Magic
item.description: A highly philosophical text about the true nature of magic, which may or may not lend itself to practical spell casting.

item.name: Book of Defence
item.description: Contains useful information about shields and armor.

item.name: Book of Smithing
item.description: Talks about various metals, including tempering and hammering techniques.

item.name: Book of Tailoring
item.description: Contains clothing designs and sewing patterns.

item.name: Book of Crafting
item.description: An innovative do-it-yourself book for tinkers.

item.name: Book of Alchemy
item.description: A research account on the chemical properties of various herbs and plants.

item.name: Book of Cooking
item.description: A book about various cooking recipes, although a lot of them center on how to make chicken taste better.

item.name: The Great Whiskey Book
item.description: Contains the accounts of Joh Benhaemin on his whiskey tasting adventures.

item.name: Golemstone
item.description: A rare material that can strengthen metals.

item.name: Troll Claw
item.description: Quite sharp and quite disgusting.

item.name: Spruce Cone
item.description: Druids love these, or might that be just another myth?

item.name: Rock
item.description: You could try throwing it...?

item.name: Gentleman's Measurements
item.description: Contain perfect measurements that help adjust armor to fit.

item.name: Heartbell Vine
item.description: A bright, bell-shaped flower opens up from the iron-strong mountain vine.

item.name: Bloodpetal Rose
item.comment: rare, special, lone ones grow in any rocky places with no other vegetation around
item.description: Sometimes the petals seem to be oozing blood. Upon closer inspection, it's just an optical illusion.

item.name: Lakesberry
item.comment: low level grows around natural waters
item.description: Associated with the summer in Imberthale, these berries are quite tasty and presumably healthy too.

item.name: Silvermirror Iris
item.comment: Silvermirror Fen only, silvermirror dandelion, grows out in the open
item.description: Herb of the witches, it's told it grows where human blood has nourished the ground.

item.name: Sorcerer's Weed
item.comment: grows on stone apparently, magical unnatural places
item.description: It's apparent this isn't purely a nature's creation.

item.name: Red Nymph
item.comment: lush, undisturbed waters, could be fished
item.description: Many have supposedly drowned trying to catch this beautiful flower, resulting in the popular saying: ''Don't be tempted by the Red Nymph''.

item.name: Noblerose
item.comment: garden flower, can be made into Noble Oil
item.description: Despite popular misconceptions, nobles tend to consider this a rather ordinary flower.

item.name: Ancient's Tears
item.description: This strange flower grows in memory of the Ancients, who ruled the land in ages past.

item.name: Dandelions
item.comment: basic low level, not in gardens
item.description: Gardeners curse these flowers, but they have merits when brewing potions.

item.name: Dawnflame Ivy
item.comment: grows in high places catching the sun
item.description: A symbol of cleansing and starting anew, the ivy 'burns in honor of a new dawn'.

item.name: Night's Bloom
item.description: It opens its petals at night and closes them for the day.

item.name: Falls Hydrangea
item.description: Where the water splashes, the hydrangea grows.

item.name: Wight's Pearls
item.comment: undead plant for undead places, Greywall
item.description: If plants can be haunted then these are it.

item.name: Skyfall Orchid
item.description: Associated with open skies and cold winds.

item.name: Voidlight Tendril
item.description: Growing only in places where nothing should ever grow, they are... wrong, somehow.

item.name: Autumnleaf Lily
item.description: They are said to have a soothing fragrance, but your undead nose can't smell a damn thing.

item.name: Cloud Yarrow
item.description: If you wriggle them, they give off a misty white spore cloud.

item.name: Spellspore Cap

A strange looking Qaeshtari object, its purpose is to bind the power of otherwordly creatures.

item.description: An amulet of old legends, you're told it has the ability to protect the mind of its wearer from all attempts of possession by magic.

item.description: A magical gem of sorts, you're told this combines with an old runed amulet to protect the mind of its wearer.\n\n<color=green>Combine with Lost Runed Amulet.</color>

item.description: A fearsome weapon of vile intents.

item.name: Miner's Lucky Charm
item.description: 'Slick Eddie', the street merchant selling these trinkets in Ratcliffe village, assures you that wearing this will bring good luck and fortune to miners.\n\n<color=green>Increases Mining crafting and gathering experience gains by 999%.</color>

customdescription.name:
'Slick Eddie', the street merchant selling these trinkets in Ratcliffe village, assures you that wearing this will bring good luck and fortune to miners.

You will be granted the blessing of mining gods themselves, and it really works! At least if you take Eddie's word for it.

Eddie wouldn't lie to you, surely not...?

<color=green>Increases Mining crafting and gathering experience gains by 999%.</color>

item.name: Evil Red Wizard's Robes
item.description: The choice of robes for someone whose mind is pure evil.
item.comment: Drop from Kyler Plair in Q87

item.description: Drinking these would be a bad idea.\n\n<color=green>Use to throw it at an enemy, inflicts poison damage based on Alchemy level.</color>

item.description: Mounting this on your own head would look very menacing indeed.
item.comment: drop from cave bear in mount silderstone cave

item.description: Molded by the darkness of caves, it's a tougher pelt than its forest bear cousin's.

item.description: Miner Hubbs' custom bag for hauling copper.

item.description: Miner Hubbs' custom bag for hauling iron.

item.description: They're thinner than other bones.

item.description: They're light as feathers.

item.description:
By pairing this tool with a hammer, miners are able to remove some impurities from ore in the field.

<color=green>Use on ore to refine it out in the field.</color>

<color=yellow>Must be paired with a hammer.</color>

item.name: Gutting Knife
item.description: Helps you cut fish up into boneless strips.\n\n<color=green>Use on raw fish to create fish fillets.</color>

item.description: A strip of pebble sturgeon expertly filleted into fancy strips.

item.description: Meaty fish chunks ideal for the making of soup.

item.description: A culinary staple in many lands, it keeps you nourished for a long time.

item.description: Sturgeon fillet seared to perfection!

item.name: Thornhill Crypt Key #3

item.description: As the name suggests, it's made for splitting wood.\n\n<color=green>Use to split logs into firewood.</color>

item.description: Capable of starting a fire, try not to burn the entire forest down.\n\n<color=green>Use to set up a campfire.</color>

item.description: A contract, awaiting your signature.\n\n<color=green>Open to read.</color>

item.name: Signed Preservation Society Contract
item.description: A contract including your signature.\n\n<color=green>Open to read.</color>

item.name: Thorne's Cape
item.description: An ancient article of clothing, once worn by a legendary settler Samuel Thorne.\n\nIt is so fragile that any attempt at wearing it would likely damage it.

item.name: Tailfin Moss
item.description: The mossy tendrils of this elusive herb are reminiscent of the undulating fins of aquatic creatures.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts fishing experience by 5%.</color>

item.name: Timberleaf Ivy
item.description: Its strong tendrils and verdant leaves embody the resilience of ancient woodlands.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts woodsmanship experience by 5%.</color>

item.name: Rockscale Leaves
item.description: Robust and sturdy, like nature's armor, its jagged leaves boast a rugged beauty.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts mining experience by 5%.</color>

item.name: Sweet Berry Pie
item.description: Its vibrant colors, delightful aroma, and bursting flavors are sure to please anyone with a sweet tooth.\n\n<color=green>Eat to recover immediate health and mana.</color>

item.name: Noble Iron Plate Armor
item.description: Proper iron battlegear offering decent protection, it's adorned by the cape of an ancient aristocrat.

item.name: Golden Chalice
item.description: The tarnished gold of this antique chalice tells tales of lavish feasts and ancient rituals of days long past.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Pretender's Crown
item.description: Thornhill never was the seat of a king, but it did accommodate pretenders. This crown might have adorned their heads.

item.name: Ancient Throne
item.description: Once upon a time someone might have sat decreeing the fate of poor peasantry from it.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Cape of an Ancient Aristocrat
item.description: A tattered relic from a bygone era, the frayed threads of this ancient cape whisper stories of opulence and refinement.\n\n<color=yellow>May be combined with an iron plate armor through tailoring.</color>
item.comment: dropped by skeleton guards in Q88 crypt 5,13, used to craft item 951

item.name: Sweet Berry Pie (Half)
item.description:
Its vibrant colors, delightful aroma, and bursting flavors are sure to please anyone with a sweet tooth.

Half a pie remains.

<color=green>Eat to recover immediate health and mana.</color>

item.name: Sweet Berry Pie (Quarter)
item.description:
Its vibrant colors, delightful aroma, and bursting flavors are sure to please anyone with a sweet tooth.

Most of the pie is eaten, but a quarter still remains.

<color=green>Eat to recover immediate health and mana.</color>

item.name: A Slice of Berry Pie
item.description:
Its vibrant colors, delightful aroma, and bursting flavors are sure to please anyone with a sweet tooth.

Only one last slice of the pie remains.

<color=green>Eat to recover immediate health and mana.</color>

item.name: Pie Crumbs
item.description: You're desperately trying to make sure to waste nothing of the delicious pie these crumbs once belonged to!

item.name: Aurora Trout
item.description: A living kaleidoscope of colors!\n\nIt swims through the waters as if adorned with the vibrant brushstrokes of nature's most masterful painter.

item.name: Shovel
item.description: A handy tool for excavating and moving earth with ease.\n\n<color=green>Use to dig.</color>

item.name: Worms
item.description: Surely a fish would rather bite this, than a bared hook.\n\n<color=green>Use to gain a fishing bonus.</color>

item.name: Aurfield Fishing Trophy
item.comment: gives movement speed boost when placed in house, need fishing rod equipped
item.description:
An award for catching the ever elusive Aurora Trout!

<color=yellow>Once placed, applies a movement speed buff in its surroundings while a fishing rod is equipped.</color>

<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Chitin Torch
item.description: Creepy, but it keeps the darkness at bay.

item.name: Orange Dye
item.description: A vibrant and warm hue that radiates energy and enthusiasm.

item.name: Blue Dye
item.description: The serene hue of boundless skies and calm oceans.

item.name: Green Dye
item.description: The verdant shade of flourishing life.

item.name: Fine Imberthalesian Wool Clothes
item.description: Fresh from the loom.

item.name: Shearston Token
item.description: A token awarded in recognition of hard work at the Shearston loom.

item.name: Robes of Dimensional Magic
item.description: Drapes the wearer in flowing fabric that seems to ripple with interdimensional energy.

item.name: Luminescent Worms
item.description: Their luminosity creates a mesmerizing spectacle in the dark depths.\n\n<color=green>Use to gain a fishing bonus.</color>

item.name: Fisherman's Wedding Ring
item.description: Though a mere wooden band, you can tell it's been carved with the utmost care and reverence.\n\nI should ask around Aurfield if anyone's missing the person it belonged to.

item.name: Mutated Crab Leg
item.description: It's long and oddly shaped.

item.name: Obsidian Crab Eye
item.description: Always wins a staring contest.

item.name: Potion of Swiftness
item.description: Bestows onto you the nature's swiftness.\n\n<color=green>Use to increase movement speed.</color>

item.name: ''The Great Mudclaw''
item.description: A gargantuan crab's pincer, it's caked in mud from the river's depths.

item.name: Log of Glowing Willow
item.description: Cut from a Glowing Willow, known for casting a serene and enchanting ambiance in moonlit evenings.

item.name: Waspheart Iris
item.description: The flower creates a captivating display of vibrant yellows.

item.name: Salvaged Cargo Crate
item.description: Stolen cargo recovered from pirates camping by the River Aure.

item.name: Blue Riverpirate's Tunic
item.description: A malevolent guise worn by those who stalk the waterways with ill intent.

item.name: Red Riverpirate's Tunic
item.description: A malevolent guise worn by those who stalk the waterways with ill intent.

item.name: Riverpirate Captain's Overcoat
item.description: Its tattered fabric bears the stains of countless betrayals and the weight of uncounted lives lost.

item.name: Riverpirate's Cutlass
item.description: A merciless instrument wielded by wicked marauders.

item.name: Riverpirate Captain's Cutlass
item.description: Its twisted steel is a testament to the cold-hearted violence and ruthless dominance of a pirate commander.

item.name: Riverpirate Captain's Hat
item.description: A crown befitting the tyrants of waters.

item.name: Willow Cartwheel
item.description: Boasts meticulously carved engravings that faithfully imitate old Haywoods traditions.

item.name: Scepter of Destiny
item.description: This scepter was made to honor a child prophesized to be destined for greatness!\n\nAlas, he was soon taken by a fever, much before he had any chance to fulfil his destiny...

item.name: Shears
item.description: An excellent tool for sheep thrills.\n\n<color=yellow>May be looted at Shearston Estate, used in the loom minigame to shear wooly sheep.</color>
item.comment: for shearing sheep in tailoring minigame

item.name: Shepherd's Bell
item.comment: Shearston tailoring reward, attracts sheep, makes them stay still and give more wool
item.description: A bell that attracts and calms the wooly sheep, bringing them close and increasing their wool growth for a while.\n\n<color=green>Use to cast Shepherd's Call at Shearston Estate, works once every 10 seconds.</color>

item.name: Spellbook: Wrathful Torrent
item.description:
Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Wrathful Torrent: 

 A spell that blasts the area around the target with powerful forces, dealing damage and knocking them unconscious.

<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Wrathful Torrent'.</color>

item.name: Monstrous Crustacean Helm
item.description: A cracked piece of a formidable chitin shell, belonged to a nightmarish creature of the river. Coincidentally it shapes well around the head.

item.name: Finest Shearston Cloth
item.comment: shearston tailoring, used to craft robes
item.description: Handwoven with precision and care by Hannah Shearston, it's smooth to touch and has a subtle sheen.

item.name: Celestial Weave
item.comment: drop from etherlight mobs, used to craft robes
item.description: The extraordinary textile dropped by Etherlight monsters possesses a captivating aura, drawing inspiration from realms beyond human comprehension.

item.name: Guide to Cotton Handling
item.description: Teaches a trait that will allow to spool cotton for tighter storage within your bags.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>
item.comment: shearston tailoring reward, learn trait to tie cotton to save inv space

item.name: Spool of Cotton
item.description: A tiny powerhouse of textile potential!\n\n<color=green>Click to unravel.</color>
item.comment: combined cotton to save inventory space, trait from tailoring minigame

item.name: Firestick Mixture
item.description: A highly flammable oil that ignites once shattered. Not to be digested!\n\n<color=green>Use to throw it at an enemy, inflicts damage based on Alchemy level.</color>

item.name: Firestick Plant
item.comment: used in alchemy to make explosives
item.description: A botanical inferno in the form of a plant.

item.name: Small Wool Storage Bag
item.description: A small sack to stuff with wool.\n\n<color=yellow>Stores up to 5 wool.</color>

item.name: Bag of Wool
item.description: Contains 10 wool.\n\n<color=green>Click to unpack.</color>

item.name: Pirate Dagger
item.description: Mostly its purpose is to stab yer mateys in the back, arr!

item.name: Bracelet of Stalwart Riverfolk
item.description: Awarded for the unyielding defence of the river and its people.

item.name: Copper Pitchfork
item.description: A pointy tool to keep hay... ahem... enemies at a distance.

item.name: Lantern of Soulsoothing
item.description: From its gentle light emanates a calming aura, its glow beckoning home lost spirits.\n\n<color=yellow>Pacifies weaker undead (below level 15), making them not attack you on sight.</color>

item.name: Note from the Priest
item.description: Contains a request for the inventor Opticus Aluminar.\n\nHis workshop is located in southwest Haywind city, near the old quarry.

item.name: The Priest's Lantern
item.description: A curious lantern, within its core shimmers a magical gem. It awaits to carry the blessings of a Priest of the Sleeping Souls.

item.name: Mystic's Amber
item.description: Believed to possess a wide variety of magical attributes.\n\nSeers profess to see visions across time beneath its cloudy surface, while holding it against light at peculiar angles.

item.name: Log of Wildsfir
item.description: Carries within its grain the echoes of the forest's windswept tales and frigid nights.

item.name: Old Artifacts
item.description: Although the real treasure was the friends I made along the way, these rare finds may also be worth something.\n\n<color=yellow>May be traded to Arty the Great Explorer at his library in Haywind.</color>
item.comment: earned from unlocking achievements and salvaging items, can be traded for rewards at haywind library

item.name: Woodworker's Outfit
item.description: Ideal for hard working conditions at the woodmill.

item.name: Troll Crossbow
item.description: Crude but effective, much like its makers. It packs quite the punch!

item.name: Grainwater Flatbread
item.description: The perfect side dish to accompany beer!\n\n<color=green>Grants a buff during which drinking beer will heal and boost damage.</color>

item.name: Woodland Skewer
item.description: The perfect lunch for a woodcutting trip.\n\n<color=green>Allows you to extract 30% more wood from a tree.</color>

item.name: Ore Hauler's Stew
item.description: A grub to keep hunger at bay while dwelling in the mines.\n\n<color=green>Grants a buff which doubles your accuracy in underground maps.</color>

item.name: Aurfield local cooking thing, something with mutated crab leg
Snail Roll
item.description: It's a Mistywood local delicacy!\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts your healing and spell resistances.</color>

item.name: Wildsfir Plank
item.description: Wild forest wood tamed into a refined plank.

item.name: Great Explorer's Map
item.description: A weathered map, hand-drawn by adventurers, filled with rough sketches and notes marking hidden paths, landmarks, and dangers.\n\n<color=green>Eliminates the cooldown of Homecoming ability while carrying the item.</color>

item.name: Eagle Statue of High Achievers
item.description:
An exquisite statue that symbolizes how much you've achieved in life.

<color=yellow>Touching the inspiring statue energizes you with a movement speed buff.</color>

<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Deep Forest Garb
item.description: Blends seamlessly with shadows and verdant undergrowth, helping you navigate the deepest and darkest of woods.

item.name: Deep Forest Hood
item.description: Conceals your face, sheltering it from nature's pestilent forces.

item.name: Symbol of the Deep Forest
item.description: A sacred emblem of Forest Dwellers, offering luck and protection against woodland predators.

item.name: Deep Forest Bracers
item.description: Sturdy leather armguards, bringing strength and confidence with the use of a hatchet.

item.name: Thornbark Token
item.description: A token of appreciation for all your hard work at the sawmill.

item.name: Wildsfir Hatchet
item.description: A hatchet with a handle carved from the noble Wildsfir wood.

item.name: Small Wildsfir Storage Bag
item.description: A small Wildsfir sack.\n\n<color=yellow>Stores up to 5 Wildsfir logs.</color>

item.name: Haunted Pickaxe
item.description: Recovered from the Sallowstone Mine, the spirit of a dead miner seems to have latched onto this pickaxe, instead of moving on to the afterlife.

item.name: Bracelet of the Troll Berserker
item.description: A barbaric emblem of chaos and carnage, it has received the blessings of a Troll Shaman.

item.name: Deer Antlers
item.description: Nature's majestic crown.

item.name: Furniture: Deer Antlers
item.description: Nature's majestic crown, adorning the wall of a home.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Antler Helm
item.description: A symbol of the wearer's connection with the wilds.

item.name: Shaman's Antler Wreath
item.description: A mystical headdress that bridges the earthly and the divine world of spirits.

item.name: Spellbook: Spirit Heal
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Spirit Heal - a persistent heal, provided you have the spirit totems to fuel it.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Spirit Heal'.</color>

item.name: Spirit Totem
item.description: A small shamanic carving made from the wood of Wildsfir.

item.name: Keg of Ale
item.description: Shipment for the Grainwater tavernkeeper.

item.name: Spellbook: Spacetime Distortion
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Errenwyr's Spacetime Distortion; a spell which allows you to move at considerable speed for a brief period.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Errenwyr's Spacetime Distortion'.</color>

item.name: Horsy Whistle
item.comment: achievement shop reward, horsy will return faster if item is in inventory
item.description: A motivational whistle for speeding up Horsy, whose sensitive ears will pick up its shrill sound across great distance.\n\n<color=green>While placed in your inventory, speeds Horsy's return from the bank by 20%.</color>

item.name: A Simple Garden Flower
item.description: A simple flower for a simple garden.

item.name: Hefty Festival Pumpkin
item.description: The crowning jewel of the harvest festival, it's radiatingly orange!

item.name: Spellbook: Blink Step
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Blink Step, which immediately transports its caster a small distance forward.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Blink Step'.</color>

item.name: Spellbook Page: Lightning Storm
item.description:
A lost page from Azzar Kheyn's Spellbook...

This one details the secrets to a spell that releases a storm of lightning around the caster.

<color=yellow>(Right-click) use this item on Azzar Kheyn's spellbook.</color>

item.name: Spellbook Page: Blizzard
item.description:
A lost page from Azzar Kheyn's Spellbook...

This one details the secrets to a spell that launches a barrage of icy projectiles against multiple enemies.

<color=yellow>(Right-click) use this item on Azzar Kheyn's spellbook.</color>

item.name: Spellbook Page: Befuddling Hex
item.description:
A lost page from Azzar Kheyn's Spellbook...

This one details the secrets to a spell that harms and slows multiple enemies.

<color=yellow>(Right-click) use this item on Azzar Kheyn's spellbook.</color>

item.name: Spellbook Page: False Life
item.description:
A lost page from Azzar Kheyn's Spellbook...

This one details the secrets to a spell that allows the caster to recover from impossible injuries.

<color=yellow>(Right-click) use this item on Azzar Kheyn's spellbook.</color>

item.name: Band of the Mountain Strider
item.description: Forged from rugged iron and marked with runes of haste, this ring grants the wearer enhanced speed, allowing for swift movement through rocky terrain. Ideal for those who navigate the mountains, it ensures they can gather resources and move swiftly across the rugged landscape.

item.name: Mantle of the Ogre King
item.description: A massive, tattered cloak woven from thick hides and adorned with crude bone ornaments.

item.name: Crown of the Tyrant
item.description: A golden crown with a single horn jutting from one side, polished to a sinister gleam.

item.name: Ability: Fury of the Unchained
item.description: Unleashing primal rage, the user’s body surges with violent energy, increasing their strength and aggression. While in this berserk state, their attacks become devastating, but they sacrifice control and defense in the heat of battle.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Fury of the Unchained'.</color>

item.name: Red Festive Citizen's Tunic
item.description: A stylish yet comfortable tunic adorned with colorful trimmings, ideal for the cosmopolitan celebrant.

item.name: Red Merchant's Festival Attire
item.description: A harmonious mix of elegance and utility, perfect for impressing festival goers.

item.name: Fancy Burgundy Festival Outfit
item.description: An extravagant adorned with intricate embroidery.

item.name: Green Festive Peasant's Tunic
item.description: A garment that combines rustic simplicity with festive flair.

item.name: Green Festive Citizen's Tunic
item.description: A stylish yet comfortable tunic adorned with colorful trimmings, ideal for the cosmopolitan celebrant.

item.name: Blue Merchant's Festival Attire
item.description: A harmonious mix of elegance and utility, perfect for impressing festival goers.

item.name: Fancy Forest Green Festival Outfit
item.description: An extravagant adorned with intricate embroidery.

item.name: Red Festive Peasant's Tunic
item.description: A garment that combines rustic simplicity with festive flair.

item.name: Jester's Outfit
item.description: Makes you appear disarming and funny, or does it...?

item.name: Jester's Hat
item.description: Though it's meant to delight and entertain, you can't shake the feeling there's something very wrong with the mask.

item.name: Trairian Fencing Attire
item.description: Lightweight and stylish, it's perfect for a swordsman looking to deal some damage!

item.name: Trairian Rapier
item.description: A masterfully crafted Trairian rapier, its exquisite balance and sharpness mark it as a true blademaster's weapon.

item.name: Tabard of the Grey Knight
item.description: It's a pleasant, dull shade of grey. The armor itself offers protection befitting a knight.

item.name: Knight's Bascinet
item.description: A symbol of martial prowess and honor.

item.name: High Striker's Hammer
item.description: Pivotal in the quest to ring the bell at the festival high striker game.

item.name: Strong Beer
item.description: Offers a rich, malty taste that warms you from the inside out.\n\n<color=green>Consume to forget your worries.</color>

item.name: Festival Bow
item.description: More of a toy than a real bow, but it can still hit a target when it counts.

item.name: Trairian Fencing Hat
item.description: Lightweight and stylish, it's perfect for a swordsman looking to deal some damage!

item.name: The Fearsome Pumpkin Head
item.description: It's the now lifeless head of a harvest pumpkin horror, it's large enough you could fit it around your own head if you wanted...

item.name: Festival Fun Prize Ticket
item.description: Awarded for participation in fun and games, it can be used to claim prizes at Little Grainwater harvest celebrations.

item.name: Executioner's Garb
item.description: A somber outfit worn by the executioner during duties.

item.name: Executioner's Hood
item.description: A dark hood for covering the face of the executioner.

item.name: Pumpkin Juice
item.description: Bursting with the flavor of ripe pumpkins and festive spices.

item.name: Hairy Spider Leg
item.description: It's giving off spider tingles.

item.name: Venomous Spider Egg
item.description: A fragile yet menacing orb, pregnant with the latent threat of venomous spiderlings soon to hatch.

item.name: Venomous Blackhair Extract
item.description: An ominous vial filled with the lethal essence of a Blackhair spider.

item.name: A Bewitched Pumpkin
item.description: There's something off with this pumpkin - it appears to have been saturated with odd magic!\n\n<color=green>Click to summon a friend.</color>

item.name: The Blade and Bane: A Practical Guide for Poisoning Weapons
item.description: The book details advanced techniques for applying various poisons onto bladed weapons.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Venomous Bladestrike'.</color>

item.name: A Package of Questionable Contents
item.description: An unassuming box, considering it holds potentially hazardous contents within.

item.name: Skill Book: Heroic Kick
item.description: The book goes into detail about unarmed techniques in a duel, namely a kick to knockback unassuming opponents.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Heroic Kick'.</color>

item.name: Skill Book: Fight Dirt with Dirt
item.description: The book details advanced techniques for punishing opponents who employ cowardly tactics in a fight.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Blinding Sand'.</color>

item.name: Broadsword of a Thornhill Knight
item.description: Engraved with the crest of House Briskwater, it's as steadfast and noble as the knights who wield it.

item.name: Hydrobor Duellist Wand
item.description: A delicate piece of wood, it serves an aspiring battlemage well.

item.name: Reinforced Pitchfork
item.description: Modified for a melee, it excels at ramming opponents!

item.name: Spellbook: Little Grainwater Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of teleporting to the Harvest Festival in Little Grainwater, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Little Grainwater'.</color>

item.name: Gatekey to the Dungeons of Greywall
item.description: You wonder what tales of despair and darkness it may unlock... but really it opens the way into the Greywall Dungeons.

item.name: Banshee Robes
item.description: The robes carry an aura of mystery and sorrow.\n\n<color=teal>The Banshee of Greywall empowered these robes.</color>
item.comment: drop from ghost of greywall boss

item.description: Casts a shade of spectral mourning over your face.\n\n<color=teal>The Banshee of Greywall empowered this hood.</color>
item.comment: drop from ghost of greywall boss

item.description: Twisted with the anguish of its once noble wearer.\n\n<color=teal>The Banshee of Greywall empowered this ring.</color>
item.comment: drop from ghost of greywall boss

item.name: Bracelet of Broken Hope
item.description: Carries with it the weight of dreams once shattered.\n\n<color=teal>The Banshee of Greywall empowered this bracelet.</color>
item.comment: drop from ghost of greywall boss

item.name: Staff of the Fallen
item.description: A mighty rod that was used to command fallen souls.\n\n<color=teal>The Banshee of Greywall empowered this staff.</color>
item.comment: drop from ghost of greywall boss

item.name: Gateguard’s Logbook
item.description: A gate guard's logbook recording individuals imprisoned and released here.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Diary of Guard Drummonds
item.description: A guard of Greywall Dungeons named Drummonds wrote this diary.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Diary of Guard Bod
item.description: A guard of Greywall Dungeons named Bod wrote this diary.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Officer’s Diary
item.description: This diary was written by a nameless officer of Greywall Dungeons.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Diary of Jorune Drey Ryefeldt
item.description: Jorune Drey Ryefeldt, a Dreamguard Champion, seems to have kept a diary of his adventures.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Diary of Drawyn Spear
item.description: This diary was written by Drawyn Spear, the Warden of the Greywall Dungeons.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Ghost Tabard
item.description: It's a pleasant, dull shade of transparent.

item.name: Ghost Bascinet
item.description: It's a pleasant, dull shade of transparent.

item.name: Ghost missing arm
item.description: It's a pleasant, dull shade of transparent.

item.name: Spectral Assassin's Dagger
item.description: It's a pleasant, dull shade of transparent.

item.name: Firestarter's Garments
item.description: GOG third boss robe

item.name: Broken Dreamguard Armor
item.description:
This mighty armor served Dreamguard Champion Jorune in life. You can tell it's of exceptional craftsmanship and must have been blessed in many ways by his Order.

It's become badly damaged, however, and pieces seem to have been torn off by raving undead.

You wonder if there was some way to repair it...

item.name: Bent Dreamguard Helm
item.description:
This mighty armor served Dreamguard Champion Jorune in life. You can tell it's of exceptional craftsmanship and must have been blessed in many ways by his Order.

It's become badly damaged, however, and pieces seem to have been torn off by raving undead.

You wonder if there was some way to repair it...

item.name: Dreamguard Plate Scrap
item.description: A plate piece torn off from the personal armor of a Dreamguard Knight.

item.name: Platearmor of a Dreamguard Champion
item.description:
Forged with great care and talent, blessed by the Order of the Sleeping Souls...

This is the personal plate of a Dreamguard Champion, whose purpose it was to return restless dead back to their eternal sleep.

<color=teal>Recovered from the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Platehelm of a Dreamguard Champion
item.description:
Forged with great care and talent, blessed by the Order of the Sleeping Souls...

This is the personal plate of a Dreamguard Champion, whose purpose it was to return restless dead back to their eternal sleep.

<color=teal>Recovered from the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Empty Greywall Key Ring
item.description: A hefty key ring, but all its keys have gone missing...\n\n<color=green>Combine with 10 Greywall Prison Keys.</color>

item.name: Greywall Low Security Keys
item.description:
Contains keys to grant a level of access most common guards would have had in Greywall, but there are still some empty slots...

<color=yellow>Opens low security doors within Greywall Dungeons.</color>

<color=green>Combine with 10 Greywall Officer Keys.</color>

item.name: Greywall High Security Keys
item.description: A set of keys that would only have been entrusted to Greywall's highest ranking officers, they may open any security door within the dungeon.\n\n<color=yellow>Opens all security doors within Greywall Dungeons.</color>

item.name: Greywall Prison Key
item.description: Presumably it could help with getting through Greywall's locked doors...\n\n<color=green>Combine 10 with an Empty Greywall Key Ring.</color>

item.name: Greywall Officer Key
item.description: Presumably it could open a highly secure door somewhere within Greywall Dungeons...\n\n<color=green>Combine 10 with Greywall Low Security Keys.</color>

item.name: 'Nature's Perfect Remedies'
item.description: The pages detail the potent healing effects of Bloodpetal Roses and Heartbell Vines.

item.name: 'Tales from the Mellorian Thales'
item.description: The book contains accounts from a time before Mellorian Thaler Lords unified under a common king.

item.name: 'Amarien's Sacrifice'
item.description: This book tells the story of Amarien, the Great Goddess of Earth.\n\n She sacrificed herself to protect her daughter Imret, turning herself into the vast mountain range known as Amarien's Wall.

item.name: 'Blood Upon the Plains'
item.description: Its pages are filled with lengthy and dry descriptions about the causes for conflict between Arnean migratory hordes and the Kingdom of Razshaskov.

item.name: 'Frantic Beasts and How to Avoid Them'
item.description: A highly comprehensive work about dangerous wildlife in Imberthale, including advice on areas and the time of day to avoid when traversing the woods.

item.name: 'Eldritch Energies in a Nutshell'
item.description: This eccentric work is one Renrik Kabaldor's dissertation on intricate arcane permutations.

item.name: <color=orange> Greywall Ritual Spellbook </color>
item.description: An ominous ritual circle is drawn upon its covers with white chalk.\n\n<color=green>Click to read.</color>

item.name: Gravelstem Whiteflower
item.description: Defying the odds, the Gravelstem anchors itself tenaciously into the hardest stone.
item.comment: crafting mat for ampoules, grows directly from stone lol

item.name: Marshland Feather Reed
item.description: Its slender form dances gracefully in a humid breeze.
item.comment: crafting mat for ampoules, grows in windy, open, but otherwise sheltered terrain near water :S

item.name: Darkmire Damp Root
item.description: A gloomy bog plant, it's oddly repellent of magical currents.
item.comment: crafting mat for ampoules, grows in waterlogged places, prefers shade

item.name: A Locket of Souls
item.description:
A boon of the Silvermirror Witches to those who would approach them seeking power.

It would bestow inhuman strength to its bearer, but slowly chip away at their soul, which would ultimately be entirely stolen by the locket.

Thus the bearer would return it back to the Witches, having become their mindless servant.

item.name: Scrap Metals
item.description: Salvaged metal remnants, often melted down for new creations.\n\n<color=yellow>May be traded in at the Scavenger's Yard.</color>

item.name: Scrap Linen
item.description: Frayed linen pieces, often valued by crafters for their versatile utility.\n\n<color=yellow>May be traded in at the Scavenger's Yard.</color>

item.name: Wood Chips
item.description: Roughly hewn wood fragments, often used for kindling or simple crafting.\n\n<color=yellow>May be traded in at the Scavenger's Yard.</color>

item.name: Rare Metal Shavings
item.description: The tiny metal fragments glimmer faintly, a treasure even in their smallest form.\n\n<color=yellow>May be traded in at the Scavenger's Yard.</color>

item.name: Scroll of True Alchemy
item.description:
This scroll allows you to accomplish every alchemist's greatest dream - to turn an object into gold!

Although it does so through the use of magic, no alchemy involved whatsoever...

<color=green>Use on an item to turn it into gold.</color>
item.comment: use on another item to turn it to gold

item.name: An Old Storage Sack
item.description: Frayed but sturdy, it has seen years of storing various goods.

item.name: test bag
item.description: Slightly increases the carrying capacity for dandelions.

item.name: test bag2
item.description: Slightly increases the carrying capacity for dandelions.

item.name: Spectral Blade
item.description: Ethereal weapon, shimmering with spectral energy.

item.name: Maggots
item.description: Squirming larvae that feast on decay, they're easily the only life to be found in a place of death.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Greywall Prisoner's Delight
item.description: Griffin Lockhart's special recipe.

item.name: Rusty Greywall Key
item.description: You're not quite sure what it's meant to unlock...

item.name: Darkened Spirit
item.description: The essence of a spirit trapped in torment, unable to move on...\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Dried Fish
item.description: Ideally should have been consumed long ago, but it's remarkably well preserved.

item.name: Spellscroll: Greywall Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to the Dungeons of Greywall.

item.name: Spellbook: Rosalind's Mortar
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of Mage's Mortar, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Mage's Mortar'.</color>

item.name: Drawyn's Dreadful Cleaver
item.description:
The trusty weapon of the Warden of Greywall, he used it to mercilessly cleave through his enemies.

<color=yellow>Its slow and powerful attacks are capable of cleaving multiple opponents in front of you.</color>

<color=teal>Recovered from the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Drawyn's Draconian Cane
item.description: The hardy cane of the Warden of Greywall, he used it to indiscriminately discipline both prisoners and guards under his charge.\n\n<color=teal>Recovered from the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Refined Iron
item.description: Produces items of good quality, but it's also harder to work than copper.\n\nIt has had some of its impurities removed.

item.name: Ore Cluster
item.description: This rock contains a cluster of different minerals.\n\n<color=green>Click to prospect.</color>
item.comment: click to get a random ore

item.name: Wildgrowth
item.description: A vareity of random herbs and plants, some of which can be useful.\n\n<color=green>Click to sort plants.</color>
item.comment: click to get a random herbo

item.name: Fancy Fish Fillet
item.description: A premium cut of fish, promising a rich taste and velvety texture.

item.name: Fancy Grilled Fillet
item.description: A premium cut of fish seared to perfection.

item.name: Tailor's Workbench
item.description: Equipped with tools for cutting, sewing, and embroidering garments.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Carpenter's Workbench
item.description: The cornerstone of a craftsman's workshop, where raw wood is transformed into functional art.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Alchemist's Workbench
item.description: A chaotic assembly of vials and ingredients, essential for transmuting base materials into magical elixirs.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Cooking Stove
item.description: A warm hearth where meals are carefully prepared, fueling both body and mind.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Anvil
item.description: The blacksmith's altar, where raw metal is forged into weapons and tools of legend.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Forge
item.description: A blazing furnace, the heart in the home of any true blacksmith.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Master Woodsman's Hatchet Rack
item.description: A meticulous array of finely sharpened hatchets, each bearing marks of mastery and dedication to the craft of woodcutting.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Master Fisherman's Rod Holder
item.description: A seasoned angler's arsenal, cradling rods that have danced with mightiest underwater creatures.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Master Miner's Pick Rack
item.description: An arsenal of steel and sweat, holding pickaxes of unmatched quality.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Master Miner's Pickaxe
item.description: The seasoned miner's most trusted companion.\n\n<color=teal>Acquired through Thornhill's mining trainer.</color>

item.name: Master Fisherman's Rod
item.description: Designed to outwit the cleverest fish in the deepest waters.\n\n<color=teal>Acquired through Thornhill's fishing trainer.</color>

item.name: Master Lumberjack's Hatchet
item.description: This hatchet bites into wood with precision unmatched in the forest's heart.\n\n<color=teal>Acquired through Thornhill's woodsmanship trainer.</color>

item.name: Treasure Hunter's Candelabrum
item.description: A golden candelabrum, may its light guide adventures to lost fortunes.
