item.description: Forged from the blood of the mountains itself, this masterwork helmet provides its wearer with near-invincibility against almost any blade.

item.name: Crystalsteel Plate Armor
item.description: Forged from the blood of the mountains itself, this masterwork armor provides its wearer with near-invincibility against almost any blade.

item.name: Crystalsteel Kiteshield
item.description: Forged from the blood of the mountains itself, this masterwork shield provides its wearer with near-invincibility against almost any blade.

item.name: Micko's Beer Shipment
item.description: The bartender working at the basement of Grainwater tavern was dearly missing this shipment.

item.name: ''Quality Wood''
item.description: This is the worst quality wood you've ever seen...

item.name: Lost Ring
item.description: Letters A and J are engraved, the owner might still live close by...

item.name: Leather
item.description: A strong crafting material.

item.name: Imberite Ore
item.description: Sourced from the rich veins of Imberthale, it's essential for the smelting of imbersteel, renowned throughout the realms for its unmatched hardiness.

item.name: Titan's Blood Ore
item.description: A rare and powerful mineral, legends tell it was formed when an ancient titan was impaled on the mountaintops and its blood seeped into the rocks.

item.name: Ice Mountain Crystals
item.description: The essence of the tallest, most freezing of Amarien's Mountains.

item.name: Rockwater Lobster
item.description: Dwelling in cold mountain streams, they have a tough, rocky shell and powerful claws.

item.name: Frostmelt Karp
item.description: Fish caught from the deep waters of the Frostmelt Lake, its frost-touched scales glisten in the sunlight.

item.name: Icewater Eel
item.description: Where water may be found within frozen caverns, this elusive eel thrives in its coldest depths.

item.name: Highland Cypress Log
item.description: A log from a towering tree that flourishes in cool, windswept peaks.

item.name: Deadwood Yew Log
item.description: A gnarled log from the Deadwood Yew, it possesses a grim, unyielding strength.

item.name: Crystalbark Birch Log
item.description: A log from the Crystalbark Birch, which against all odds grows in eerily beautiful and deadly frozen landscapes.

item.name: Mountain Beast's Hide
item.description: The hide of a ferocious mountain beast, it's tough enough to withstand brutal conditions and powerful attacks.

item.name: Tough Ogreskins
item.description: As thick as the heads of the ogres these skins were taken from.

item.name: Wyrmhound Hide
item.description: Shaped by the Wyrmhound's draconic ancestry, these hides are extremely resistant against physical and elemental attacks.

item.name: Mountain Beast's Fur
item.description: The dense, fine quality of the mountain beast's fur makes for a prized crafting material among talented tailors.

item.name: Shamanic Linens
item.description: Fabrics enchanted through shamanic rituals, they may be used in the crafting of powerful magical garments.

item.name: Frosthardened Cotton
item.description: Cotton forged in the eternal mountain frost, it's absorbed unique magical powers.

item.name: Mountain Beast Steak
item.description: A robust meal, as wild and powerful as the creature it came from.

item.name: Wyrmhound Steak
item.description: Containing a hint of draconic essence, it delivers a meal full of strength and a fiery kick.

item.name: Astral Grazer Steak
item.description: A juicy, tender cut packed with otherworldly flavors.

item.name: Imbersteel Ingot
item.description: Forged from a mineral native to the hinderlands of Imberthale, it's renowned throughout the realms for its unmatched hardiness.

item.name: Titanite Ingot
item.description: Infused with the ancient power of titans themselves, it's essential for creating nearly indestructible gear.

item.name: Crystalsteel Ingot
item.description: The cystalsteel shimmers in the light, reflecting the cold power of the mountains.

item.name: Barbed Tribal Fittings
item.description: Vicious barbed fittings crafted by tribal smiths to reinforce armor and weapons.

item.name: Amarien's Crystal
item.description: A rare and coveted treasure, believed to channel the raw energies of the mountains where it’s found.

item.name: Raw Mountain Beast Meat
item.description: Very dense and gamey, but also rewarding when cooked right.

item.name: Raw Wyrmhound Meat
item.comment: ogre mountain, ogres and ice cave beast drop
item.description: This flesh contains the power of draconic ancestry is, but will require great skill to cook so that it's edible by a human.

item.name: Raw Astral Grazer's Meat
item.description: Picked from the skeletal carcass of an otherwordly Dark Grazer.

item.name: Mountaneer's Pickaxe
item.description: Perfect for cutting through the toughest rock and ice.

item.name: Frostmelt Fisherman's Rod
item.description: A durable rod made for expert anglers, able to withstand harsh conditions in order to reel in the toughest fish.

item.name: Highland Woodsman's Hatchet
item.description: Designed to chop through dense wood with ease, perfect for wilderness survival.

item.name: Crystal Hunter's Pickaxe
item.description: A finely crafted pickaxe, designed for harvesting rare crystals with precision and care.

item.name: Crystalwaters Fisherman's Rod
item.description: An elegant rod ideal for catching the most elusive fish in the rarest of waters.

item.name: Mountaintop Woodsman's Hatchet
item.description: Built to handle the toughest trees in the most extreme mountain conditions.

item.name: Cooked Rockwater Lobster
item.description: Underneath its tough shell you finally reach its juicy, succulent meat and you determine... it tastes just like chicken!

item.name: Cooked Frostmelt Karp
item.description: You expect the rare mountain fish to taste something exotic, but no - to your surprise, it actually tastes like chicken.

item.name: Cooked Icewater Eel
item.description: It has an absolutely unique flavor, yet also somehow oddly familiar and comforting... could it be...? Chicken!

item.name: Permafrost Shard
item.comment: ogre mountain t3 crafting mat from ice mobs
item.description: This shard, pulled from eternal ice, radiates a cold so intense it never melts.

item.name: Intricate Tribal Ring
item.description: A finely crafted ring adorned with tribal symbols, offering protection and strength to its wearer.

item.name: Ring of the Mountain King
item.description: There has never been a king in these mountains, but it's nice to pretend.

item.name: Barbarian Bracer
item.description: The mark of a ferocious mountain warrior.

item.name: Bracer of the Mountain King
item.description: There has never been a king in these mountains, but it's nice to pretend.

item.name: Amarien's Battlehelm
item.description: Ultimate work of mastercraftsmanship, this armor serves as a tribute to Amarien, the Goddess of Earth.\n\nWho, according to legend, sacrificed herself to protect her daughter Imret from the Mad Titan, turning herself into a vast mountain range.

item.name: Amarien's Battlearmor
item.description: Ultimate work of mastercraftsmanship, this armor serves as a tribute to Amarien, the Goddess of Earth.\n\nWho, according to legend, sacrificed herself to protect her daughter Imret from the Mad Titan, turning herself into a vast mountain range.

item.name: Simple Tribal Fittings
item.comment: drop from ogre wilderness mobs, t1 items crafting
item.description: Basic yet functional tribal fittings, crafted to reinforce armor and weapons with natural materials and simple adornments.

item.name: Titanstone
item.comment: drop from wilderness bandits to craft ebin kreogu gear
item.description: This odd artifact radiates raw power; it must have been found hidden in some dark corner of the mountains.

item.name: Steel Ingot
item.description: An ingot of steel.

item.name: Simple Traveller's Bag
item.description: This simple traveller’s bag is lightweight and reliable, ideal for storing supplies while on the road.\n\n<color=orange> Designed by master artisan Opticus Aluminar. </color>

item.name: Spellbook: Crafting Guild Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of teleporting to the Crafting Guild in Haywind, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Crafting Guild (Haywind)'.</color>

item.name: Decayed Barbarian Blade
item.description: Though highly corroded, it's still capable of delivering dangerous blows.
item.comment: guaranteed drop from tyroghar on first kill

item.name: Skillbook: Summon Horsy
item.description: This book goes into long-winded detail about the various whistles one may employ in order to summon a trusted horse companion.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Summon Horsy', which calls Horsy back to you from the stables.</color>

item.name: Functional Adventurer's Bag
item.description: A highly versatile bag, perfect for long expeditions.\n\n<color=orange> Designed by master artisan Opticus Aluminar. </color>

item.name: High Quality Journeyman's Bag
item.description: An expertly crafted bag, made from premium materials to withstand long travels and harsh conditions.\n\n<color=orange> Designed by master artisan Opticus Aluminar. </color>

item.name: Spellscroll: Bulwark Cliff Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to the Bulwark Cliff.

item.name: Azzar Kheyn's Spellbook
item.description: Confiscated from the nefarious wizard Azzar Kheyn, this book contains magical secrets from a more civilized era.\n\nIts power remains somewhat diminished, however, unless reunited with some of its lost pages...

item.name: Scavenger's Toolkit
item.comment: Includes everything you need to dismantle, salvage, and repurpose found materials.\n\n<color=yellow>You may (right-click) use this item on another to destroy it for salvaged materials.</color>

item.name: Spellbook: Bulwark Cliff Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of teleporting to the Bulwark Cliff, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Bulwark Cliff'.</color>

item.name: Ancient Toy Helmet
item.description: It has a unique design and a sturdy make, but it seems to have been crafted for a child, and is thus too small for your head to wear.

item.name: Lost Key to a Mountain Stash
item.description: An adventurer may have once lost this key, which opens a hidden stash of supplies somewhere within the mountains...
item.comment: opens chest for random loot in ogre mountain ruins

item.name: Spellbook: Enchant a Scroll of True Alchemy
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets to enchanting a scroll with the magic of true alchemy, which may turn an item into its worth in gold!\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Enchant a Scroll of True Alchemy'.</color>

item.name: Haywind Prison Guard Outfit
item.description: With some luck, you may pass off as a prison guard while wearing this.

item.name: Library Book
item.description: A book, which is meant to be kept in library. Some people just never return their books...

item.name: Key to Sly Jonne's Cell
item.description: This key opens the door to Sly Jonne's prison cell.
item.comment: Q110 to key sly jonne out

item.name: Marauder's Underbelly Key Half (ring)
item.description: An important key snapped in half and distributed among trusted lieutenants for safekeeping.\n\n<color=yellow>(Right-click) use on another key half.</color>
item.comment: Q111 key half to enter underground

item.name: Marauder's Underbelly Key Half (teeth)
item.description: An important key snapped in half and distributed among trusted lieutenants for safekeeping.\n\n<color=yellow>(Right-click) use on another key half.</color>
item.comment: Q111 key half to enter underground

item.name: Key to Marauder's Underbelly
item.description: Grant's entrance to the Bandit Lord's lair.
item.comment: Q111 key to enter underground, combine key halves

item.name: The Great Blackshield
item.description: Lord Blackshield's fearsome black shield.

item.name: Marauder's Armor
item.description: Light yet durable, this armor protects without slowing its wearer. Ideal for those who need speed as much as defense.
item.comment: in Q111 battle outside the fort Bandit fortress outfit

item.name: Skillbook: Shield Bash
item.description: Studying this book will reveal secret techniques to bashing your opponents with your shield.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Shield Bash'.</color>

item.name: Part of a Goblin Effigy
item.description:
It looks pretty wicked.

1 of 5 parts.

<color=green>Use on another part to combine once all parts are collected.</color>

item.name: Part of a Goblin Effigy
item.description:
It looks pretty wicked.

2 of 5 parts.

<color=green>Use on another part to combine once all parts are collected.</color>

item.name: Part of a Goblin Effigy
item.description:
It looks pretty wicked.

3 of 5 parts.

<color=green>Use on another part to combine once all parts are collected.</color>

item.name: Part of a Goblin Effigy
item.description:
It looks pretty wicked.

4 of 5 parts.

<color=green>Use on another part to combine once all parts are collected.</color>

item.name: Part of a Goblin Effigy
item.description:
It looks pretty wicked.

5 of 5 parts.

<color=green>Use on another part to combine once all parts are collected.</color>

item.name: Wicked Goblin Effigy
item.description: It definitely looks wicked.\n\nYou may set the effigy up at a goblin place of worship.

item.name: Rusty Shackles
item.description: This corroded iron tells tales of despair and confinement.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Corroded Prison Chain
item.description: Its links, corroded by time, feel like they could crumble at any moment.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Rotten Tooth
item.description: Don't forget to brush!\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Tattered Fragment of a Greywall Uniform
item.description: A frayed piece of fabric from a once proud uniform.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Cursed Flesh
item.description: Grotesque piece of flesh saturated with dark magic.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Essence of Fear
item.description: An intangible aura of terror emanates from this object.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Whisp Essence
item.description: The fleeting essence of a luminescent spirit.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Rotted Hood
item.description: A burlap sack placed on the head of prisoners to be tortured.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Rotted Hood
item.description: A burlap sack placed on the head of a tortured prisoner.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Putrid Tail
item.description: Mired in decomposition, it serves as a vile relic of its former strength.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Putrid Incisor Tooth
item.description: A tooth removed from the jaw of an undead dog.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Putrid Fang
item.description: Extracted from the maw of a beast long since succumbed to corruption.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Unliving Fungus
item.description: Somehow the curse of undeath has seeped even to this fungi.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Essence of Torment
item.description: An object so seeped with suffering, echoes of unending agony emanate from it.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Cursed Finger
item.description: The tarnished finger of an undead mage, it's still twitching, forever suspended in casting a spell.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Foul Armor Fragment
item.description: A shard of armor, its surface marred by corruption and decay.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Foul Weapon Piece
item.description: A corroded shard of what was once a fearsome weapon, its edge blunted by curses and the passage of time.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Desiccated Sinew
item.description: Long since stripped of life, it's a macabre display of dread and decay.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Preserved Bone
item.description: A bone from the undisturbed depths of a dark tomb.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Accursed Broadsword
item.description: Cursed steel was used in the forging of this sword...\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Accursed Kite Shield
item.description: More than anything, this shield is given strength by dark and unnatural forces.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Accursed Greatsword
item.description:
Cursed steel was used in the forging of this sword...

<color=yellow>Its slow and powerful attacks are capable of cleaving multiple opponents in front of you.</color>

<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Accursed Plate Helmet
item.description: More than anything, this helmet is given strength by dark and unnatural forces.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Accursed Plate Armor
item.description: More than anything, this armor is given strength by dark and unnatural forces.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Ghoulhide Wraps
item.description: Unholy flesh and hide stitched into an abominable garment.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Ghoulhide Hood
item.description: Unholy flesh and hide stitched into an abominable hood.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Sinew Crossbow
item.description: A rugged crossbow made from brittle bone and twisted sinew, creaking with each movement.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Staff O' Whisp
item.description: Holding this gives you an eerie, unsettling feeling.

item.name: Wand O' Wisp
item.description: Powered by wisps!

item.name: Shield O' Wisp
item.description: Resistant to magic, this shield gives off a faint glow.

item.name: Wraith's Hood
item.description: The shadow of death is woven into the fabric of this hood.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Wraith's Robes
item.description: The shadow of death is woven into the fabric of these robes.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Skeletal Bow
item.description: Forged from the remains of the fallen, the eerie bow creaks as if something about it is not quite dead.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Magical Font
item.description: A curious reservoir of magical powers, you've never seen its like before.\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Shackles of Regret
item.description: A constant reminder of choices that cannot be undone...\n\n<color=teal>Empowered by the taint of Greywall.</color>

item.name: Letter to Vegetable Vendor
item.description: I shouldn't read other people's letters.

item.name: Surgeon's Tools
item.description: Treat wounds in the medieval way.

item.name: Haybale
item.description: Feed for the horsies.

item.name: Cannon Frame
item.description: A robust frame designed to mount a powerful cannon.\n\nTo be installed at Harshwind Cliff cannon site.

item.name: Cannon Barrel
item.description: Forged from the strongest iron, it's waiting to unleash a fiery breath.\n\nTo be installed at Harshwind Cliff cannon site.

item.name: Cannonballs
item.description: An unforgiving orb of iron.\n\nTo be installed at Harshwind Cliff cannon site.

item.name: Empty Black Powder Pouch
item.description: An empty vessel, waiting to be filled with refined black powder.

item.name: Black Powder Pouch
item.description: The alchemist's contribution to warfare, a pouch carrying the seeds of destruction.\n\nTo be installed at Harshwind Cliff cannon site.

item.name: Black Sand
item.description: Flakes of sand created from mining the infamous Black Stone, known as a material that can be refined into an explosive with the right know-how.

item.name: Horsy's Saddlebags
item.comment: item not obtainable in game, bag opens from horsy dialogue

item.name: Miner's Lost Bag
item.description: A miner dropped this, I should return it to him.

item.name: Cavebreaker Pickaxe
item.description: Given to you by a frightened miner after you retrieved his gear from a dangerous cave.

item.name: A Pretty Bundle of Flowers
item.description: A pretty bundle of flowers radiating natural beauty!

item.name: Mosquito Salve
item.description: Sorely needed after mosquitoes have had a go at you.

item.name: Book of Little Knowledge
item.description: There's very little knowledge in this book, but still more than none.\n\n<color=green>Gain 1000 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Book of Knowledge
item.description: Allows you to know things.\n\n<color=green>Gain 2500 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Book of Fine Knowledge
item.description: The quality of knowledge in this book is higher than usual.\n\n<color=green>Gain 5000 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Book of Great Knowledge
item.description: When you wish to know things, it's better to know great things, as opposed to other things.\n\n<color=green>Gain 10 000 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Book of Incredible Knowledge
item.description: With incredible knowledge comes incredible responsibility.\n\n<color=green>Gain 25 000 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Book of Mind Bending Knowledge
item.description: After trying out this knowledge, you won't ever feel the same again.\n\n<color=green>Gain 50 000 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Spellscroll: Mountain Watchtowers Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to the Watchtowers of Old, in Amarien's Foothills.

item.name: Azzar's Robes
item.description: The shadow of death is woven into the fabric of these robes.

item.name: Azzar's Staff
item.description: The shadow of death is woven into the fabric of these robes.

item.name: Dark Crawler's Twitchy Leg
item.description: It continues to twitch unnervingly long after being severed.

item.name: Ashmarked Skeletal Hand
item.description: All that remains of a restless skeletal warrior, whose body was burned in a war long past.

item.name: Cursed Statue
item.description: Once a symbol of power, its magic has since soured.

item.name: Rock Scorpion's Tail
item.description: The hardened tail of a rock scorpion, known for its durability and deadly sting.

item.name: Dragon Hound Fangs
item.description: Sharp and fearsome, they're reminiscent of the power of real dragons.

item.name: Arcane Powder
item.description: Fine powder infused with magical energies.

item.name: Lost Key to a Mistywood Stash
item.description: An adventurer may have once lost this key, which opens a hidden stash of supplies somewhere within the Mistywood...

item.name: Lost Key to a Forest Stash
item.description: An adventurer may have once lost this key, which opens a hidden stash of supplies somewhere within Haywind's forests...

item.name: Chunks of Mountain Fish
item.description: Handily processed chunks of fish caught from freshwater mountain streams.

item.name: Split Highland Wood
item.description: Expertly split logs from high quality highland wood.

item.name: Refined Mountain Ore
item.description: Mix of rich mountain minerals.

item.name: Artisan's Work Glove
item.description: A fine glove for the demanding work of craftsmen, but it still lacks specialization...

item.name: Artisan's Trinket Base
item.description: Every craftsman requires a charm of good luck, this makes for a fine beginning but it still lacks specific adornments...

item.name: Fisherman's Glove
item.description: Offers its wearer a strong grip and protection against wet, slippery catches.

item.name: Fisherman's Trinket
item.description: Brings fortune and bountiful catches to its wearer.

item.name: Lumberjack's Glove
item.description: Provides excellent grip and protection against rough wood and sharp tools.

item.name: Lumberjacks's Trinket
item.description: A small, wooden charm providing its wearer good fortunes and protection in the forest.

item.name: Miner's Glove
item.description: Offers good protection and grip while handling rough tools and jagged rocks.

item.name: Miner's Trinket
item.description: Provides protection and luck to all who work deep underground.

item.name: Lordly Outfit
item.description: An outfit made from the finest fabrics, symbolizing nobility and power.

item.name: Lost Key to a Prowler's Thicket Stash
item.description: An adventurer may have once lost this key, which opens a hidden stash of supplies somewhere within the Prowler's Thicket...

item.name: Boiled Potato
item.description: Boil 'em, mash 'em, stick 'em in a stew!

item.name: Cabbage Rolls
item.description: Steamed bundles of cabbage, hated by children but highly nutritious.

item.name: Cornbread
item.description: Sweet and comforting.

item.name: Pottage
item.description: A thick, rustic stew.

item.name: Corn Porridge
item.description: Rich in texture with a mild, wholesome flavor.

item.name: Carrot Soup
item.description: A blend of earthy flavors.

item.name: Meat and Potatoes
item.description: A hearty dish of tender meat paired with perfectly roasted potatoes.

item.name: Rather Interesting Book
item.description: A captivating read, its pages are brimming with unusual facts and intriguing lore.\n\n<color=green>Gain 100 xp in a skill of your choosing.</color>

item.name: Package for Rainer
item.description: I should deliver this to Rainer's general store.

item.name: Spellscroll: Scavenger's Yard Teleport
item.description: Consume the power within this scroll to teleport yourself to the Scavenger's Yard.

item.name: Lakesweed
item.description: A refreshing freshwater weed, favorite among mountain fishermen.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts fishing experience by 15%.</color>

item.name: Barkshroom
item.description: A small, dark mushroom that thrives in damp forests, chewing on them can feel inspiring to the mind.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts woodsmanship experience by 15%.</color>

item.name: Gravelstem Root
item.description: A dense, layered plant with a strong, earthy taste.\n\n<color=green>Temporarily boosts mining experience by 15%.</color>

item.name: Cursed Bones
item.description: Remnants of poor souls, who were once lost in Greywall's cursed depths.\n\n<color=teal>Found within the dungeons of Greywall.</color>
item.comment: from greywall to craft bone items

item.name: Bone Staff
item.description: A crude staff fashioned from a thick, hollow bone, touched by magic.

item.name: Ogre Shaman's Idol
item.description: A crude wooden idol carved from dark, knotted roots, adorned with feathers and stained with ochre.

item.name: Ogre Tyrant's Bracelet
item.description: A thick, weathered iron bracelet marked with dents and scars from battles fought.

item.name: Winterpine Log
item.description: Dense wood with an arctic resilience.

item.name: Coldstone Iron Ore
item.description: The chilled iron has been hardened by extreme cold.

item.name: Clearwater Salmon
item.description: Found only in the most pristine waters.

item.name: Winterpine Fabric
item.description: Unique fabric handcrafted only within Winterpine Forests, the durable cloth retains warmth and offers protection against wounds.

item.name: Spellbook: Evergreen Hearth Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets of teleporting to the Town, provided you have adequate skill in magic.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Town'.</color>

item.name: Spellbook: Snowstorm
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets to release a wintery wrath upon your enemies.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Snowstorm'.</color>

item.name: Survivalist's Bandage
item.description: A protective healing bandage that helps one survive out in the wilds.\n\n<color=green>Applies a buff on use, which will automatically heal you when you fall below 30% health.</color>

item.name: Elemental Crystal
item.description: A rare shard infused with the primal power of a raging elemental spirit.

item.name: Elk Hide
item.description: A tough yet supple hide taken from the majestic forest elk, it's valued by hunters and craftsmen alike.

item.name: Hearthlight Festival Token
item.description: The village of Evergreen Hearth is celebrating their traditional Hearthlight Festival!\n\nThese tokens may be traded in for various festival related goods at the village.

item.name: Cooked Clearwater Salmon
item.description: A pure fish with a delicate taste, almost like... chicken?!

item.name: Hearthside Logs
item.description: Their only purpose is to feed the fires of Hearthside Lodge, but they need to be split into firewood first.

item.name: Winterpine Wand
item.description: A slender wand carved from Winterpine, its cool wood is in tune with wild forest magic.

item.name: Winterpine Bow
item.description: Crafted from the heartwood of Winterpine, its arrows strike as swift and cold as a northern gale.

item.name: Coldstone Iron Dagger
item.description: A weapon of icy precision, its Coldstone Iron edge bites deeper than steel.

item.name: Coldstone Iron Staff
item.description: A sturdy conduit for magic, its Coldstone Iron core brims with energy.

item.name: Tundra Robes
item.description: Enchanted garments that shield their wearer both from enemies and the biting cold of frozen wastelands.

item.name: Tundra Hood
item.description: Enchanted hood that shields its wearer both from enemies and the biting cold of frozen wastelands.

item.name: Coldstone Iron Ingot
item.description: Forged from hardy Coldstone Iron.

item.name: Elemental Wand
item.description: A wand empowered by the essence of a primordial gale!

item.name: Elemental Bow
item.description: A bow empowered by the essence of a primordial gale!

item.name: Enchanted Snow
item.description:
The snow shimmers with magical energy, making it alive.

It may call forth a complete menace of a snowman, adept at taunting everything in sight to attack you.

<color=green>Summon the Bewitched Snowman, the agent of chaos.</color>

item.name: Ability Book: Frozen Arrows
item.description: Studying this book will reveal the secrets to enchanting your arrows with freezing magics.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the ability 'Frozen Arrows'.</color>

item.name: Festive Gifts
item.description: They're decorative only, they don't actually contain anything inside.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Candy Cones
item.description: The unrivaled favorite of village children.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Hearthlight Wreath
item.description: An evergreen wreath of gentle, cozy warmth.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Festively Decorated Tree
item.description: Beautifully decorated tree radiating joy.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Ogre Head
item.description: Nothing sparks festive cheer like a decapitated ogre.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Snow Gentleman
item.description: A snowman, but also a gentleman.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Snowman
item.description: A whimsical snowman.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Fun Wooly Sock
item.description: Nothing brightens the spirit like a fun wooly sock.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Hanging Festival Decorations
item.description: Hang them up to spark joy!\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Elk's Head Helm
item.description: After all, why not...? Why should I not wear it?

item.name: Reindeer Trophy
item.description: Decorate your home with an authentic reindeer!\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Snow Globe
item.description: A charming keepsake, it allows you to bring winter home with you no matter how far you travel.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Traditional Tundra Village Rug
item.description: Warm, woolen rug, its designs reflect the heritage of the frozen north.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Spellbook: Evergreen Hearth Teleport
item.description: Studying this book will allow you to always find your way back to the cozy village of Evergreen Hearth.\n\n<color=green>Consume to learn the spell 'Conveyance: Evergreen Hearth'.</color>

item.name: Hearthside Firewood
item.description: I should feed these into the fires of the Great Hearth of Hearthside Lodge. Quickly before folk start getting cold!

item.name: Traditional Tundra Village Garb
item.description: An attire that combines warmth and cultural heritage.

item.name: Traditional Tundra Village Garb
item.description: An attire that combines warmth and cultural heritage.

item.name: Traditional Tundra Village Garb
item.description: An attire that combines warmth and cultural heritage.

item.name: Vinter's Garments
item.description: An attire that combines warmth and cultural heritage.

item.name: Woofy Toy
item.description: A squeaky toy that allows a Woofy to always find you, no matter where you are.\n\n<color=green>Summon your friendly Woofy..</color>

item.name: Ring of Protection from Hypothermia
item.description: Keeps your spirit warm and body in motion, even against the fiercest gales.\n\n<color=green>Reduces slow duration by 50%.</color>

item.name: Frostwolf Fang
item.description: A razor-sharp fang of wintery ferocity.

item.name: Wildseer's Ring
item.description: The powers of the ring expand the mind, granting vision on secrets of the wild.

item.name: Raw Elk Meat
item.description: A favored treat by snow wolves.

item.name: Elk Pottage
item.description: A thick, rustic elk stew.\n\nIt's not the most imaginative recipe, but it just works...

item.name: Bramblewood
item.description: Dark, twisted wood.

item.name: Steel Plate Helmet
item.description: A durable helmet forged from steel, favored by knights.

item.name: Steel Plate Armor
item.description: A full suit of steel, favored by knights.

item.name: Steel Kiteshield
item.description: A shield of reinforced steel, built for steadfast defense.

item.name: Steel Broadsword
item.description: Forged for balance and power, it's the weapon of choice for knights.

item.name: Steel Greatsword
item.description: A towering sword of steel, delivering devastating strikes..\n\n<color=yellow>Its slow and powerful attacks are capable of cleaving multiple opponents in front of you.</color>

item.name: Steel Dagger
item.description: A compact blade of sharpened steel, to be employed with precision and speed.

item.name: Bramblewood Wand
item.description: A gnarly wand favored by devious witches.

item.name: Bramblewood Staff
item.description: A gnarly staff favored by devious witches.

item.name: Bramblewood Bow
item.description: Despite the gnarly nature of the wood its carved from, arrows shot from it fly straight.

item.name: Village Firewood
item.description: Villagers in Evergreen Hearth are expecting shipments of firewood. I should deliver these to the village hall, the tailor's house and the blacksmith's house.

item.name: Soft Snowball
item.description: A lightly packed, perfect for playful winter skirmishes.\n\n<color=green>Click to cast an ice spell on it, requires 1 arcane powder.</color>

item.name: Icy Snowball
item.description: A super solid snowball, hardened by to ice by magic.

item.name: Beautifully Giftwrapped Package
item.description: A woman in Evergreen Hearth asked me to deliver it to his husband, and I did not have the heart to refuse.\n\nThe husband is working at a lumberyard southeast of the village.

item.name: Beautifully Giftwrapped Package
item.description:
I tried delivering it to a lumberjack, but instead got drawn into ridiculous non-sense, where he refused to take the package.

The lumberjack told me I should keep it myself.

<color=green>Click to open.</color>

item.name: Shopping List
item.description: A ridiculously long shopping list filled with household items, tools, and some unnecessary luxuries.\n\nThere's a note included saying the gold should be just enough, provided he doesn’t overspend like he usually does.

item.name: Talisman of a Goblin Raider
item.description: A collection of bones put together in a way you presume is a talisman.

item.name: Talisman of a Goblin Trickster
item.description: Some kind of animal bones, sharpened into an object that you suppose could pass off as a talisman.

item.name: Talisman of a Goblin Mystic
item.description: A bead nestled within bone, this is certainly a mighty talisman! Or some other magical trinket.

item.name: Evergreen Hearth Wood Delivery
item.description: The steward at the village hall in Evergreen Hearth is expecting this delivery.

item.name: Evergreen Hearth Fish Delivery
item.description: The steward at the village hall in Evergreen Hearth is expecting this delivery.

item.name: Evergreen Hearth Ore Delivery
item.description: The steward at the village hall in Evergreen Hearth is expecting this delivery.

item.name: Rune of Displacement
item.description: Use this enchanted rune to mark a location, which you can then return to using an altar of displacement at home.\n\n<color=green>Use to mark a location.</color>

item.name: Altar of Displacement
item.description: A magical device that promptly transports you to the last location you marked with a rune of displacement.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: Beacon of Recall
item.description: A magical device, which will promptly draw you back home when the correct spell is invoked.\n\n<color=green>Use this item to place it within your owned house.</color>

item.name: The Grim Talon
item.description: A grim scimitar taken as a trophy of victory over a legendary barbarian warrior!\n\nWith the proper smithing expertise this formidable weapon could be turned downright mythical...

item.name: The Crimson Talon
item.description: The grim scimitar of a mountain lord, its blade is infused with the blood of the fallen, and it thirsts forever more...\n\n<color=yellow>Allows a special leap attack, which temporarily grants 50% lifesteal to normal attacks and 100% lifesteal to Quick Strike.</color>

item.name: Hexscroll: Arcane Ruin
item.description: Invoke a shamanic hex, unleashing the magic of the scroll against your foe, crippling their resistance to magical attacks.\n\n<color=green>Use to curse your enemy.</color>

item.name: Hexscroll: Shattered Steel
item.description: Invoke a shamanic hex, unleashing the magic of the scroll against your foe, crippling their resistance to melee attacks.\n\n<color=green>Use to curse your enemy.</color>

item.name: Hexscroll: Piercing Wounds
item.description: Invoke a shamanic hex, unleashing the magic of the scroll against your foe, crippling their resistance to ranged attacks.\n\n<color=green>Use to curse your enemy.</color>

item.name: Decorative Wooden Chest
item.description: A simple wooden chest, though this one is not actually any good for storing valuables.

item.name: War Map Table
item.description: Every lord of a castle needs a few imposing tables with war plans, even when there's no real war going on.

item.name: Iron Maiden
item.description: Perfectly decorative, or maybe for storing someone you don't like.

item.name: Small Wooden Throne
item.description: Excellent for any room where the lord may have an audience.

item.name: Castle Chair
item.description: A sturdy chair well suited for castle halls.

item.name: Castle Table
item.description: A fine table of good craftsmanship, well suited for castle rooms.

item.name: Banquet Hall Table
item.description: A simple, large table, best suited for serving many guests.

item.name: Castle Bench
item.description: A heavy wooden bench, perfect for resting in the quiet corners of castle halls.

item.name: Tome and Lectern
item.description: A fancy stone lectern holding an important looking tome, though in reality its pages are mostly filled with pretentious non-sense.

item.name: Castle Bed
item.description: A fine bed for a fine lord of the castle.

item.name: Folding Chair
item.description: Sometimes you just need a practical chair.

item.name: Wooden Pillory
item.description: Relax, it's only for show...

item.name: Mountain Portal
item.description: A stone portal of an ancient civilization, recovered within the Amarien Mountains, it remains functional!\n\n<color=yellow>May be used to travel to various locations within Amarien's Foothills.</color>

item.name: World Portal
item.description: An advanced portal of an ancient civilization, recovered from an unmarked ruin, it still remains functional!\n\n<color=yellow>May be used to travel to various locations all across the lands of Imberthale.</color>

item.name: Mountaineer's Backpack
item.description: A hardy mountain warrior's backpack, capable of holding all essentials while traversing the rugged terrain.

item.name: Wall-mounted Swords and Shield
item.description: A decorative display of strength and honor!

item.name: Golden Candle
item.description: An elegant golden candle, befitting the lord of a fine castle!

item.name: Barrels
item.description: A collection of wooden barrels best suited for the storage of liquids made from grain.

item.name: Crates
item.description: A stack of wooden crates, to create the illusion that you home is well-stocked.

item.name: Shaman Drum
item.description: A mystical drum, perhaps taken from a goblin witch?

item.name: Monster Skull
item.description: Most likely the skull of a dragonhound, but you can claim it was once a real dragon.

item.name: Cannon
item.description: A small iron cannon, courtesy of Thornhill's Academy of Masters.

item.name: Stack of Cannonballs
item.description: A stack of cannonballs, which could theoretically be fired by a cannon.

item.name: Bookcase
item.description: A wooden bookshelf, not for reading, but for impressing illiterate guests with your wisdom.

item.name: Small Pottery
item.description: Especially useful in a kitchen, you suppose.

item.name: Worn Statue
item.description: A faded statue of an unknown figure with an air of mystery... you can easily claim it was a masterwork once, alas its details lost to time.

item.name: Sack of Potatoes
item.description: Who doesn't love potatoes after all.

item.name: Rolled Sleeping Mattress
item.description: A simple straw mattress, for peasants and servants alike.

item.name: Stacked Sacks
item.description: A stack of rugged sacks, often occupying the larder.

item.name: A Lone Sack
item.description: A lone sack filled with unknown goods, casually left behind for someone to trip over.

item.name: Simple Red Rug
item.description: A simple red rug, adding a touch of warmth to any room.

item.name: Small Vase
item.description: A delicate ceramic vase, used for decoration or holding flowers.

item.name: Decorative Square Rug
item.description: An intricately woven square rug with fancy patterns.

item.name: Decorative Rug
item.description: An intricately woven long rug with fancy patterns.

item.name: Plant in a Vase
item.description: A staple of interior decoration - a potted plant in a finely crafted vase, placed upon a pedestal!

item.name: Castle Ballista
item.description: A powerful weapon to defend your castle against would be enemies!

item.name: Statue of Divinity
item.description: Something to inspire men for the greater good and transcendence, or something.

item.name: Weapons Rack
item.description: A sturdy wooden rack holding an assortment of weapons for battle-ready warriors.

item.name: Flowers in Wooden Planter
item.description: A set of colorful flowers to brighten any space.

item.name: Single Barrel
item.description: A classic wooden barrel, best suited for the storage of liquids made from grain.

item.name: Single Crate
item.description: A simple wooden crate, to create the illusion that you home is well-stocked.

item.name: Barbarian Banner
item.description: A tattered barbarian banner, signaling your dominance over the mountain barbarians.

item.name: Simple Blue Rug
item.description: A soft blue rug, adding a touch of cool warmth to any room.

item.name: Dark Grazer Skeletal Statue
item.description: A haunting statue of the mysterious, otherworldy Dark Grazer. It is actually difficult to tell with these creatures whether they're dead or not.

item.name: Night Table
item.description: A small wooden nightstand, perfect for placing a candle or a book, or why not a bottle of whiskey.

item.name: Round Vase
item.description: A delicate ceramic vase, but it's round.

item.name: Fancy Mirror
item.description: If you stare into it long enough, you find yourself staring back at you.

item.name: Potion Stand
item.description: A strange potion holder to create an aura of mystery about you, it's best not to drink the potion.

item.name: Simple Green Rug
item.description: A reliable green rug, adding a touch of natural warmth to any room.

item.name: Ordinary Wooden Chair
item.description: It's ordinary in every meaning of the word.

item.name: Brazier
item.description: A metal brazier to serve the role of a brazier.

item.name: Skeletal Statue of Unlucky Warrior
item.description: Serves a macabre reminder of what being unlucky may look like.

item.name: Bear Rug
item.description: Great way to add rustic charm to a room, and to build a reputation as a talented hunter.

item.name: Ordinary Wooden Bench
item.description: It's ordinary in every meaning of the word, but it's also a bench.

item.name: Small Decorative Chest
item.description: A simple wooden chest, except smaller, and this one is not actually any good for storing valuables.

item.name: Straw Rug
item.description: A basic but comfortable rug that adds a touch of warmth to any room.

item.name: Castle Catapult
item.description: A siege weapon designed to siege down castles, but can be used in a castle to siege its besiegers instead.

item.name: Bucket of Scrolls
item.description: A bucket full of lost knowledge, or perhaps secret maps, or whatever you want to tell admiring guests.

item.name: Pile of Buckets
item.description: Yes, it's buckets in a haphazard pile, for you never know when you might need a bucket.

item.name: Wooden Drawer
item.description: A simple wooden drawer for every day items.

item.name: Round Red Carpet
item.description: Adds a nice sense of regality to any room.

item.name: Ordinary Wooden Table
item.description: It's ordinary in every meaning of the word, but it serves as a table.

item.name: Large Decorative Rug
item.description: An intricately woven round rug with fancy patterns.

item.name: Banner of Domination
item.description: A banner signifying the defeat of Grimgull - the Big Baron of Amarien Mountains - may it fly high above the gates of Squallstone Keep as a symbol of your victory!\n\n<color=green>Place on the top floor of the Squallstone Keep to unlock an achievement!</color>
